mapper.update:
update c_spell
CHAMPION_ID = #{championId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SPELL_TYPE = #{spellType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODES = #{modes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMONER_LEVEL = #{summonerLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL_TIPS = #{levelTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOOLTIP = #{tooltip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE_FULL = #{imageFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE_SPRITE = #{imageSprite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_spell set CHAMPION_ID = #{championId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPELL_TYPE = #{spellType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODES = #{modes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMONER_LEVEL = #{summonerLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL_TIPS = #{levelTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOOLTIP = #{tooltip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_FULL = #{imageFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_SPRITE = #{imageSprite,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
